flawed_nl_solution:
Deshaun read 192000 pages because 60 x 320 = <<60*320=192000>>192000
The person closest to him read 144000 pages because 192000 x 0.75 = <<144000=144000>>144000
They read 1800 pages a day because 144000 / 80 = <<144000/80=1800>>1800
#### 1800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19200, not 192000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
